Articles.Content:
I'll try Gilly. Hopefully, someone won't do it before me. (I had that with the pool challenge...)

I was about to give it a go to put up something a little easier, but I'll let you have at it. It's good to let others get in there and play.

Had that happen to me with the Minmus landing...

heh, and me with the mun.

Edited October 15, 2014 by Jean Deaux

Javascript is disabled. View full album

New challenge: dock two crafts from two launches in low minimus orbit.

Edit: Sorry Jedi Master.

Edited October 16, 2014 by Zipmafia

I like this thread. I hope it lasts a good long while.

Also, I find it funny how there's like eight posts before anyone actually bothers to land on Mun xD

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Next task: Crash land a ship on Minmus' surface in a spectacular way but so that your Kerbal survives. Rescue the stranded Kerbonaut in a creative way.

Edited October 16, 2014 by Leathan

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Next: Destroy VAB!

Edited October 16, 2014 by Mrbobmcwilly

Really!?!?! Nobody is going to take this one?

FINE!!! I will do another challenge just because I want to see this game progress!

Next challenge: Land on top of the administration building's Helipad!
Wow this challenge took off. You guys sure know how to do it! I can never figure out how to get a challenge started lol.

Okay, that took too many attempts, but was fun. I played with making an actual helicopter but couldn't get the top to spin like I'd seen in some other videos. Didn't feel like downloading and installing a mod that had a chopper, so just built a flying can in the end. Video of the successful helipad landing for you.

Next up...

A new GPS invention has just been released and we need 3 satellites equally spaced on a Kerbin equatorial geosynchronous orbit. Get to it, the product is scheduled to ship next week!

(hint: Geosynchronous orbit is at 2868.75km [1009.019 /ms])

Edited October 17, 2014 by Jean Deaux
Corrected spelling

uh oh! That is the VAB, I said the administration building. You know, the new one with the pool?

Ill leave it up to the OP on if that one passes or not.

I really like your new challenge though!

uh oh! That is the VAB, I said the administration building. You know, the new one with the pool?

Ill leave it up to the OP on if that one passes or not.

I really like your new challenge though!

Busted! You're quite right sir, I was focused on helipad I totally missed the required building. I wouldn't accept that run as an acceptable mission, so back into the can, Jeb!!!

Helipad landing... on the Admin bldg... take 2...

And back to my previous challenge of...

A new GPS invention has just been released and we need 3 satellites equally spaced on a Kerbin equatorial geosynchronous orbit. Get to it, the product is scheduled to ship next week!

(hint: Geosynchronous orbit is at 2868.75km [1009.019 /ms])
Well that was interesting, next up: Run a Kerbal Over
Next up: Land on both the Mun and Minmus in one launch.

Ok, I tried to stay away from this challenge for a while to give other players a chance to put in an entry. But since I haven't seen any in days, here you go...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I really like this challenge and don't want to see it die.

Next challenge: Get a plane to reach at least 2000 m/s, then land safely!

This thread seems fun time for me to join in

2000m/s plane + safe landing

Oh its getting hot in here...Next Challenge; plant a flag on top of the aztec pyramid

And now...

Crash into the sun!

And now...

Crash into the sun!

Uhm, these challenges are supposed to be easy enough for new players to do. That's hard enough to do for an expert.

Uhm, these challenges are supposed to be easy enough for new players to do. That's hard enough to do for an expert.

It's just a matter of delta-V. I'll have a go.

It's not THAT hard... just need a bigger rocket.

Look Ma! Serial Staging!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Challange: Fly a rocket-plane on Eve. (preferably using Mk 2 parts) (return not nessisary or expected)

Edited October 21, 2014 by Rakaydos

I hereby call dibs on this! it's going to be tiny because i use 6.4 scale Kerbin...

FAR and the 8km/s orbital speed around eve with 6.4 scale kerbin aren't playing at all well, i tried for like an hour, still won't work, so i blame it for this failing.

Challange: make a plane that can land on Duna. Bonus: Make it useful and practical somehow.

Edited October 21, 2014 by bs1110101

Space plane to Duna, with science package.

Next up, hoping to get some "new" meat on board...

Get a wheeled vehicle to the Mun, plant a flag at least 2km away from your lander and show off your new out of this world ride with a pic.

Done, didnt plant a flag because my beloved Jebediah got buggy and he couldnt move after a minor crash i had.

He still made it 2.3km away from his landing vehicle.

Next up: Crash into an asteroid. Dont grab him or anything,just crash a spaceship on it.(you can choose Asteroid size and Probe/Manned/Whatever)

http://imgur.com/a/CJDYE/

Javascript is disabled. View full album

(I hope i didnt screw it up with the images,it's my first time doing a challenge)

(PS: How can i make the imgur album show up in here???)

(PS2: I Linked the final image and the rest are on the link above)

(PS3: I made it, u put your Album code "CJDYE" in [imgur ] [/imgur ] brackets. Thanks Zipmafia.

Edited October 21, 2014 by Fizban
I Fixed the album display.

Done, didnt plant a flag because my beloved Jebediah got buggy and he couldnt move after a minor crash i had.

He still made it 2.3km away from his landing vehicle.

Next up: Crash into an asteroid. Dont grab him or anything,just crash a spaceship on it.(you can choose Asteroid size and Probe/Manned/Whatever)

http://imgur.com/a/CJDYE

(I hope i didnt screw it up with the images,it's my first time doing a challenge)

(PS: How can i make the imgur album show up in here???)

Change the "url" and the "/url" in your text code to "img" and "/img". Or the Imgur site probably has a spot you can click on that copies a link for you to your clipboard you can paste here.

Edited October 21, 2014 by Jean Deaux

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums!

hope this helps!

I like this thread. Great idea.

I'll see if a chance comes up soon in my save to crash into an asteroid, but I'll definitely be looking out to see what challenge is next!

It looks like I have taken it upon myself to keep this challenge afloat as long as somebody else will give me something to do...

I give you "Asteroid Collision"

Next challenge: drive to or land on one of the mountains west of KSC! I want a good shot of the view from up there.

Edited October 22, 2014 by Zipmafia
